title: When does work end?
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.

abstract: 'I need some air, I need freedom, I need peace and quiet'.
description: Daphne Yarram gives a candid account of her life, helping the abused, poor and unfortunate in her community, trying to make things better for her mob. Despite feeling satisfaction helping her community, Yarram also feels lonely and tired at times.
